TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FolderBrowserDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog
Public NotInheritable Class FolderBrowserDialog Inherits CommonDialog
public ref class FolderBrowserDialog sealed : System::Windows::Forms::CommonDialog

summary.span: 提示使用者選取資料夾。

span.span: Prompts the user to select a folder.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別可用來提示使用者瀏覽、 建立以及最後選取的資料夾。This class provides a way to prompt the user to browse, create, and eventually select a folder. 當您只想允許使用者選取資料夾，而不是檔案時，請使用這個類別。Use this class when you only want to allow the user to select folders, not files. 瀏覽的資料夾是透過樹狀目錄控制項。Browsing of the folders is done through a tree control. 可以選取只從檔案系統資料夾。無法將虛擬資料夾。Only folders from the file system can be selected; virtual folders cannot. 一般而言之後建立新, ，您將設定從這裡開始瀏覽位置。Typically, after creating a new , you set the to the location from which to start browsing. 您可以選擇性地設定至絕對路徑的子資料夾的，一開始會選取。Optionally, you can set the to an absolute path of a subfolder of that will initially be selected. 您也可以選擇性地設定屬性，以向使用者提供其他指示。You can also optionally set the property to provide additional instructions to the user. 最後，呼叫方法，以向使用者顯示的對話方塊。Finally, call the method to display the dialog box to the user. 當關閉對話方塊和對話方塊因是、是包含所選資料夾的路徑的字串。When the dialog box is closed and the dialog box result from is , the will be a string containing the path to the selected folder. 您可以使用屬性來控制使用者是否能夠建立新的資料夾與**新資料夾** 按鈕。You can use the property to control if the user is able to create new folders with the **New Folder** button. 是強制回應對話方塊。因此，當顯示，它會封鎖應用程式的其餘部分直到使用者選擇的資料夾。 is a modal dialog box; therefore, when shown, it blocks the rest of the application until the user has chosen a folder. 當對話方塊會顯示為強制回應，沒有輸入 （鍵盤或滑鼠按一下） 可以在對話方塊中的物件發生除外。When a dialog box is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the dialog box. 程式必須隱藏或關閉對話方塊 （通常在某些使用者動作的回應） 之前呼叫程式輸入可能會發生。The program must hide or close the dialog box (usually in response to some user action) before input to the calling program can occur. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立應用程式可讓使用者開啟中的 rich text 格式 (.rtf) 檔案控制項。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式會初始化成為其預設值的屬性。The default constructor initializes properties to their default values. 當新建立時，屬性設定為、屬性設定為空字串 ("")、屬性設定為空字串，而屬性設定為`true`.When a new is created, the property is set to , the property is set to an empty string (""), the property is set to an empty string, and the property is set to `true`. 一般而言之後建立新, ，您將設定從這裡開始瀏覽位置。Typically, after creating a new , you set the to the location from which to start browsing. 您可以選擇性地設定的子資料夾的路徑，一開始會選取。Optionally, you can set the to the path of a subfolder of that will initially be selected. 您也可以選擇性地設定屬性，以向使用者提供其他指示。You can also optionally set the property to provide additional instructions to the user. 最後，呼叫方法，以向使用者顯示的對話方塊。Finally, call the method to display the dialog box to the user. 當關閉對話方塊和對話方塊因是、是包含所選資料夾的路徑的字串。When the dialog box is closed and the dialog result from is , the will be a string containing the path to the selected folder. 是強制回應對話方塊。因此，當顯示，它會封鎖應用程式的其餘部分直到使用者選擇的資料夾。 is a modal dialog box; therefore, when shown, it blocks the rest of the application until the user has chosen a folder. 當對話方塊會顯示為強制回應，沒有輸入 （鍵盤或滑鼠按一下） 可以在對話方塊中的物件發生除外。When a dialog box is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the dialog box. 程式必須隱藏或關閉對話方塊 （通常在某些使用者動作的回應） 之前呼叫程式輸入可能會發生。The program must hide or close the dialog box (usually in response to some user action) before input to the calling program can occur. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立應用程式可讓使用者開啟中的 rich text 格式 (.rtf) 檔案控制項。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定對話方塊中樹狀檢視控制項上方的描述性文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the descriptive text displayed above the tree view control in the dialog box.
The description to display.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以用來指定給使用者，例如指示的其他資訊。The property can be used to specify additional information to the user, like instructions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立應用程式可讓使用者開啟中的 rich text 格式 (.rtf) 檔案控制項。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生於使用者按一下對話方塊上的 [說明] 按鈕時。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the **Help** button on the dialog box.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

span.span: Resets properties to their default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重設， ，和成為其預設值的屬性。Resets the , , and properties to their default values. 如需預設值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of default values, see the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Environment::SpecialFolder RootFolder { Environment::SpecialFolder get(); void set(Environment::SpecialFolder value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定開始瀏覽的根資料夾。

span.span: Gets or sets the root folder where the browsing starts from.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的資料夾和其下的任何子資料夾將會出現在對話方塊中，並供選取。Only the specified folder and any subfolders that are beneath it will appear in the dialog box and be selectable. 屬性，連同，您決定所選取的資料夾 對話方塊時顯示，只要是絕對路徑的資料夾的子資料夾（或更精確地說，資料點的子資料夾所代表的殼層命名空間)。The property, along with , determines what the selected folder will be when the dialog box is displayed, as long as is an absolute path that is a subfolder of (or more accurately, points to a subfolder of the shell namespace represented by ). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立應用程式可讓使用者開啟中的 rich text 格式 (.rtf) 檔案控制項。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]

Protected Overrides Function RunDialog (hWndOwner As IntPtr) As Boolean
public: property System::String ^ SelectedPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定使用者所選取的路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path selected by the user.

value.span: 在對話方塊中第一個選取的資料夾路徑或由使用者選取的最後一個資料夾。

span.span: The path of the folder first selected in the dialog box or the last folder selected by the user.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定顯示對話方塊前，使用此路徑的資料夾將會選取的資料夾，因此只要設為的子資料夾的絕對路徑（或更精確地說，資料點的子資料夾的殼層命名空間所表示)。If the property is set before showing the dialog box, the folder with this path will be the selected folder, as long as is set to an absolute path that is a subfolder of (or more accurately, points to a subfolder of the shell namespace represented by ). 如果傳回，這表示使用者已按下**確定** 按鈕，屬性會傳回字串，包含所選資料夾的路徑。If the returns , meaning the user clicked the **OK** button, the property will return a string containing the path to the selected folder. 如果傳回，這表示使用者取消對話方塊中，此屬性會有相同的值與它的之前顯示對話方塊。If returns , meaning the user canceled out of the dialog box, this property will have the same value that it had prior to displaying the dialog box. 如果使用者選取的資料夾沒有實體路徑 （例如，我的電腦）**確定**對話方塊上的按鈕將會停用。If the user selects a folder that does not have a physical path (for example, My Computer), the **OK** button on the dialog box will be disabled. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立應用程式可讓使用者開啟中的 rich text 格式 (.rtf) 檔案控制項。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: for getting the path.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowNewFolderButton { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否在資料夾瀏覽器對話方塊中顯示 [新增資料夾] 按鈕。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **New Folder** button appears in the folder browser dialog box.

value.span: 如果**新資料夾**按鈕是顯示在對話方塊中，否則。

span.span: if the **New Folder** button is shown in the dialog box; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是`true`、**新資料夾**按鈕就會顯示讓使用者有機會建立資料夾。When is `true`, the **New Folder** button is visible, giving the user a chance to create a folder. 當使用者按一下**新資料夾** 按鈕，建立新的資料夾，並提示使用者指定的資料夾名稱。When the user clicks the **New Folder** button, a new folder is created and the user is prompted to specify the folder name. 在樹狀目錄中選取的節點會變成新資料夾的父系。The selected node in the tree becomes the parent of the new folder. 實際的標題**新資料夾**按鈕可以依據作業系統而The actual caption of the **New Folder** button can vary depending upon the operating system > [!IMPORTANT] > 設定至`false`無法在 Windows 2000 上執行。Setting to `false` does not work on Windows 2000. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立應用程式可讓使用者開啟中的 rich text 格式 (.rtf) 檔案控制項。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]
